imdb.plot outline: Intimate Portraits: African Football Stars is an interactive talk show featuring in-depth interviews on location with the top brass of African soccer players. Three of the best players will be selected from the 20 countries battling it out in the 2010 edition of the Africa Cup of Nations. The players will be interviewed about various aspects of their personal lives in a bid to paint an "intimate portrait."
imdb.title: Intimate Portraits: African Football Stars
akas: Intimate Portraits: African Football Stars (South Africa)
plot: _Intimate Portraits: African Football Stars_ (qv) is an interactive talk show featuring in-depth interviews on location with the top brass of African soccer players. Three of the best players will be selected from the 20 countries battling it out in the 2010 edition of the Africa Cup of Nations. The players will be interviewed about various aspects of their personal lives in a bid to paint an "intimate portrait."::Grace
